maze.logic

Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • maze.logic.Maze

  • public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    Maze.java - The class which contains all methods to play the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Maze

        public Maze(int dimension,
            int dragonNum,
            Maze.DRAGON_MODE dm)
        Creates a new maze

        This constructor limits the number of dragons, the maze dimension and returns an exception if these requirements are not met.

        Parameters:
        dimension - maze width and height
        dragonNum - the number of dragons to insert on the maze
        dm - the behaviour of all dragons

      • Maze

        public Maze(int dimension)
        Creates a new maze by filling it with walls.
        Parameters:
        dimension - the dimension of the new maze

      • Maze

        public Maze(char[][] m)
        Copies a given maze.
        Parameters:
        m - maze to be used.

      • Maze

        public Maze()
        Imports the maze defined in class.
        This maze was given to us in the 2nd iteration of the class.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method.
        Parameters:
        args - the arguments

      • update

        public void update(Maze.DIRECTION direction)
            throws EndGame
        Moves the hero.
        Also moves all the dragons if possible.
        Settles any fights that may occur.
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction chosen for the hero
        Throws:
        EndGame - if game is over

      • updateHero

        public MovementInfoHero updateHero(Maze.DIRECTION direction)
        Moves the hero in the selected direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - direction to move the hero
        Returns:
        information about the movement made by the hero

      • updateDragon

        public MovementInfoDragon updateDragon(Dragon dragon)
        Evaluates possible directions the dragon may take.
        Moves dragon in a random direction if possible.
        Parameters:
        dragon - the dragon to be analysed
        Returns:
        information about the movement made by the dragon

      • moveDragon

        public void moveDragon(Dragon dragon,
                       Maze.DIRECTION direction)
        Moves dragon.

        Also updates the contents in the maze

        Parameters:
        dragon - the dragon to be moved
        direction - the direction to move the dragon

      • HeroVsDragon

        public void HeroVsDragon(Dragon dragon)
        If the hero and the dragon are within fighting distance resolves the dispute

        Hero wins if he has the sword.
        Dragon wins if hero doesn't have the sword.

        Parameters:
        dragon - the dragon to check
